05104805-ebae-427e-a211-b384455b97aa:
The {g|Encyclopedia:CareerLeaderGlossary}Officer{/g} gains +10 {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Willpower{/g} and +10 {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerFellowship}Fellowship{/g} when they have less than 50% of their {g|Encyclopedia:MaxWounds}maximum wounds{/g} remaining. They also gain an additional +10 Willpower and +10 Fellowship after using any Officer {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}ability{/g} on a target with less than 50% {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}wounds{/g} for 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g}.
These two sets of {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonuses{/g} stack with each other but do not stack with themselves (the Officer can only have up to +20 Willpower and +20 Fellowship granted by this {g|Encyclopedia:Talent}talent{/g} at any given time).
0653ef2d-9f6b-4646-a5aa-07e00fc29e78: Whenever an ally is affected by an {g|Encyclopedia:CareerLeaderGlossary}Officer{/g}'s {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}ability{/g} or {g|Encyclopedia:Talent}talent{/g} that grants {g|Encyclopedia:TemporaryWounds}temporary wounds{/g}, that ally's {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}armour{/g} is increased by +10% for 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g}. Does not stack.
09eb54b8-4f34-4963-a35d-59f6fe79f07e: The {g|Encyclopedia:Range}range{/g} of the {g|Encyclopedia:CareerLeaderGlossary}Officer{/g}'s {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}abilities{/g} is increased by +3. The range of Voice of Command is increased by +6.
0a869024-94d2-476f-8f55-e24228372b5c: Whenever the {g|Encyclopedia:CareerLeaderGlossary}Officer{/g} targets an ally with an action (an {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}ability{/g} or an attack), that ally's {g|Encyclopedia:Resolve}resolve{/g} is increased by +1 until the end of the Officer's next {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}. This effect stacks and is prolonged until the end of the Officer's next turn each time it stacks. Cannot be prolonged past the Officer's next turn.
0bef0515-6b82-4ebe-b509-52096ab06e57: The target of Bring It Down! gains +1 {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}AP{/g}. If they finish their {g|Encyclopedia:ExtraTurn}extra turn{/g} using this {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}ability{/g} with 0 AP, they will suffer {unit_stat|WarhammerWillpower|bonus} {g|Encyclopedia:DirectDamage}direct damage{/g}.
128181fd-09e5-4577-afc5-139af211780a: The {g|Encyclopedia:CareerLeaderGlossary}Officer{/g} increases an ally's {g|Encyclopedia:Resolve}Resolve{/g} by a {uip|ResolveBonus|32c0e0539f8548b08780089f8006f54a} until the end of combat. If the target is under the effect of Voice of Command, they will start their next {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g} with 1 additional {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}action point{/g}.
14a5b239-39ee-4084-abcb-0c0578cbe33f: Targets of To Me! take −15% less {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} until the start of the {g|Encyclopedia:CareerLeaderGlossary}Officer{/g}'s next {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}. This reduction is doubled to −30% for targets taking their turn while under the effect of To Me!.
1b8f0a03-878c-4b97-8e53-2a269c52d30b: Whenever the {g|Encyclopedia:CareerLeaderGlossary}Officer{/g} targets an ally with an {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}ability{/g} for the first time in a {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g}, that ally gains +{unit_stat|WarhammerWillpower|bonus} {g|Encyclopedia:TemporaryWounds}temporary wounds{/g}.
281eda93-48b7-4c73-9fcd-886657fd7c7a: This character cannot be targeted by the Voice of Command {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}ability{/g}.
37d374be-3f91-4329-bb36-9ea7f862653a: The {g|Encyclopedia:CareerLeaderGlossary}Officer{/g} grants an ally an {g|Encyclopedia:ExtraTurn}extra turn{/g} with full {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}AP{/g} and {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}MP{/g}. During the extra {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}, there is no attack limit.
3ba0fbf3-62a3-4882-965d-1378256f29f0: This {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}ability{/g} can only target allies who have enemies adjacent to them. Until the start of the {g|Encyclopedia:CareerLeaderGlossary}Officer{/g}'s next {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}, all {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}melee attacks{/g} made by the target deal additional {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} equal to {uip|BonusDamage|b509a3ee5ab44253b4b859dd5f3dbffb} multiplied by the number of enemies adjacent to the target when this ability is used. If the target is under the effect of Voice of Command, they immediately make an {g|Encyclopedia:AttackOfOpportunityFullGlossary}attack of opportunity{/g} against an adjacent enemy, targeting the one with the lowest remaining {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}wounds{/g}.
445fe3e6-606c-48e1-b549-c8ef42937c3e: Whenever the {g|Encyclopedia:CareerLeaderGlossary}Officer{/g} uses an Officer {g|Encyclopedia:Career}archetype{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}ability{/g} two times in one {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g} that does not grant an {g|Encyclopedia:ExtraTurn}extra turn{/g}, they gain the stand {g|Encyclopedia:Witness}witness{/g} effect. Stand Witness: the next Officer archetype ability that does not grant an extra turn will also affect the Officer.
5080855f-fb87-44d4-8255-3f56953f03c3:
{g|Encyclopedia:CareerLeaderGlossary}Officers{/g} use their {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Willpower{/g} and {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerFellowship}Fellowship{/g} to improve the combat capabilities of their allies, turning them into even greater threats on the battlefield.
Core focus: {g|Encyclopedia:ExtraTurn}extra turns{/g}, single target buffs, rescuing allies, {g|Encyclopedia:MomentumWithDetailsGlossary}momentum{/g}.
7948708e-7079-4dbd-97ca-7008af7e2b78:
The {g|Encyclopedia:CareerLeaderGlossary}Officer{/g} grants an ally an {g|Encyclopedia:ExtraTurn}extra turn{/g} with full {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}AP{/g} and {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}MP{/g}. During the extra {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}, there is no attack limit.
Until the end of combat, the Officer's {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerFellowship}Fellowship{/g} is halved.
7ec55513-3d9c-44c2-9be5-65fd669681f0: The {g|Encyclopedia:CareerLeaderGlossary}Officer{/g} immediately grants an ally an {g|Encyclopedia:ExtraTurn}extra turn{/g} with {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}action points{/g} equal to 2 and no {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}movement points{/g}.{br} If the ally is under the effect of Voice of Command and kills an enemy before the end of the Officer's {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}, the ally gains a one-time additional +{uip|Momentum|5bfccf14d8604ae1a041fb347fb8f19f} {g|Encyclopedia:MomentumWithDetailsGlossary}momentum{/g}.
8ab70f5c-4693-4187-bf93-99495f5415c2: Allies affected by the {g|Encyclopedia:CareerLeaderGlossary}Officer{/g}'s {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}abilities{/g} gain a {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} to all {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}resistance tests{/g} equal to {uip|ResistanceBonus|c2d1294cea0644baa6f6dac2270dffdc}.
8b0c530e-e244-4d83-8bbe-fe70dbae1907: At the start of each of the {g|Encyclopedia:CareerLeaderGlossary}Officer{/g}'s {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turns{/g}, the Officer uses Voice of Command on a random ally that is not {g|Encyclopedia:Overexerted}overexerted{/g}. This ally will not suffer the overexerted effect and can be targeted by Voice of Command again.
9b1ea6b1-e480-4324-b422-412a16b7cb4d: Air of Authority immediately grants {g|Encyclopedia:MomentumWithDetailsGlossary}momentum{/g} to the target equal to the target's {g|Encyclopedia:Resolve}resolve{/g}.
9fad135c-fb77-4f7b-a205-7669234aa1f2: The target of Finest Hour! gains more {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonuses{/g}: -During their {g|Encyclopedia:ExtraTurn}extra turn{/g}, any kill made by the target restores 1 {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}AP{/g} and 1 {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}MP{/g} (up to {unit_stat|WarhammerFellowship|bonus} times). -The target can redirect the {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}ability{/g} with their remaining AP and MP to another target.
a2ad8f02-3a53-42d6-ba4e-aa1c7264cbd8: Take Aim! also increases the {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} of the next {g|Encyclopedia:Range}ranged{/g} attack by +2% for each cell between the attacker and the target.
a94ae4ac-da33-4a25-b4c0-471a9bb0d9c1: This {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}ability{/g} can only be used on allies who can reach the {g|Encyclopedia:CareerLeaderGlossary}Officer{/g} by moving fewer than 20 cells. The Officer immediately makes an ally move toward the Officer by taking the shortest possible path.{br} If the target is under the effect of Voice of Command, it gains +{uip|ArmourBonus|19b029e81dae4e418fddfc6d24af3f6a}% {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}armour{/g} until the end of the Officer's {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}. If the target remains adjacent to the Officer, any attacks made against the Officer will target them instead until the effect of To Me! ends.
b13a73ae-b496-48da-af35-c9501685bc6d: Half of the {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} granted by the Voice of Command remain until the end of combat. This bonus does not stack with itself or with bonuses granted by Voice of Command but does count as an {g|Encyclopedia:CareerLeaderGlossary}Officer{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}ability{/g} effect for the purposes of other {g|Encyclopedia:Talent}talent{/g} effects.
be8a1037-df0b-4f91-8b59-7c29223c91b8: Whenever the {g|Encyclopedia:CareerLeaderGlossary}Officer{/g} uses an {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}ability{/g} on an ally, that ally gains a {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} to their {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerPerception}Perception{/g} and {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerBallisticSkill}Ballistic Skill{/g} equal to {unit_stat|WarhammerFellowship|bonus}. These bonuses stack, but half of the stacks (rounded up) are lost at the end of the target's {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}.
cac67073-0cca-410d-b5aa-d7d919c0eb1b: The target gains +{uip|TemporaryWounds|2ec870598a2543a083fbac734fcec6db} {g|Encyclopedia:TemporaryWounds}temporary wounds{/g} until the end of combat.
cb2d292b-d47a-45b7-9a13-7367ba18feb5: Whenever an ally starts a {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g} (including any {g|Encyclopedia:ExtraTurn}extra turn{/g}) adjacent to the {g|Encyclopedia:CareerLeaderGlossary}Officer{/g}, that ally gains additional {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}MP{/g} equal to {uip|MovementPoints|45e575a80a5d49a1ad9bc5ba0537fd98}.
cbb582c4-d57b-41ed-a6f1-90a43202edbd: Get Back in the Fight! removes 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Injury}fresh injury{/g} from the target and heals the target for {uip|Heal|3bdde6bd1c65417d846e34e3d084d571} {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}wounds{/g} for each condition removed by Get Back in the Fight! (including fresh injuries). A minimum of {uip|Heal|3bdde6bd1c65417d846e34e3d084d571} wounds is always healed, even if no conditions are removed.
d183a733-54e7-4874-be62-062af9c8603e: Whenever an ally uses a {g|Encyclopedia:HeroicAct}heroic act{/g}, that ally gains {g|Encyclopedia:TemporaryWounds}temporary wounds{/g} equal to <u>(10% of their {g|Encyclopedia:MaxWounds}maximum wounds{/g} + {uip|Resolve|5f3732268bf044fab685fcead7998a3c})</u>.
d286f516-5cb1-44e8-beac-3c071d46d189: Whenever the {g|Encyclopedia:CareerLeaderGlossary}Officer{/g}'s {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}ability{/g} moves any target, the Officer gains {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}movement points{/g} equal to half the distance the target moved. If this happens on another character's {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}, the Officer will gain these movement points on their next turn.
d34dbdd4-3abb-42d0-94cb-e38047a87c4c: Targets of Move! Move! Move! gain a +10% {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} to {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}dodge{/g} and a +10% bonus to {g|Encyclopedia:DetailsOfTheCoverGlossary}cover efficiency{/g} until the start of the {g|Encyclopedia:CareerLeaderGlossary}Officer{/g}'s next {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}.
d4540d14-854b-4d18-843e-5f359a104e3b: The target of Finest Hour! gains more {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonuses{/g}: -All {g|Encyclopedia:NegativeEffectTypesGlossary}negative effects{/g} are immediately removed from the target. -Until the end of the {g|Encyclopedia:CareerLeaderGlossary}Officer{/g}'s next {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}, the target cannot die (its {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}wounds{/g} cannot be reduced below 1).
d4a586f2-4e52-4d64-9eb9-8ffb29969c4e: The next {g|Encyclopedia:CareerLeaderGlossary}Officer{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Career}archetype{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}ability{/g} that does not grant an {g|Encyclopedia:ExtraTurn}extra turn{/g} will also affect the Officer.
d58a61f3-7d40-456b-b771-d039cc6e8435: The {g|Encyclopedia:CareerLeaderGlossary}Officer{/g} immediately grants an ally additional {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}movement points{/g} equal to {unit_stat|WarhammerFellowship|bonus}.{br} If the target is under the effect of Voice of Command, it ignores {g|Encyclopedia:AttackOfOpportunityFullGlossary}attacks of opportunity{/g} until the end of the Officer's {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}.
da4856fc-0dd4-4a0f-9d65-145f305b1a4a: The {g|Encyclopedia:CareerLeaderGlossary}Officer{/g} encourages an ally, who immediately recovers from {g|Encyclopedia:BurningEffect}burning{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:BleedingEffect}bleeding{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:ToxinEffect}toxin{/g}, and stun effects.{br} If the target is under the effect of Voice of Command, they also gain +{uip|TemporaryWounds|083057fc1a6b47f29ea0409337135030} {g|Encyclopedia:TemporaryWounds}temporary wounds{/g}.
dc9fa369-358d-4c5a-b70e-77244fbf9eef: The target of Finest Hour! gains more {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonuses{/g}: -During their {g|Encyclopedia:ExtraTurn}extra turn{/g}, the target deals +{uip|DamageBonus|cb35c9899b354cb596a4ec619811afeb} {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g}. -Until the end of combat, the target gains the effect of Voice of Command.
dec1a7e2-8fe3-4d45-8e89-d852622a4424: Break Their Ranks! works as if there were one more enemy adjacent to the target. This allows this {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}ability{/g} to be used on targets with no enemies adjacent to them.
f0bdf9af-8099-4c8d-a2ae-9d1338ba9aeb: Whenever the {g|Encyclopedia:CareerLeaderGlossary}Officer{/g} makes an attack, they gain +5 {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerFellowship}Fellowship{/g} until the end of combat.
f14764c4-2907-4b47-9f1c-102aa5771aa2: Whenever the {g|Encyclopedia:CareerLeaderGlossary}Officer{/g}'s {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}ability{/g} grants {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}action points{/g} to an ally, that ally also gains +1 to all {g|Encyclopedia:Characteristic}characteristics{/g} for every action point gained until the end of combat.
f6e6bb53-2b2e-43ce-b5b6-41aaba3d0e24:
The {g|Encyclopedia:CareerLeaderGlossary}Officer{/g} treats their own or their ally's {g|Encyclopedia:Injury}fresh injury{/g}.
! Once after each combat.
f954e67d-43df-43f0-b133-dfb5c7b89f09: Allies under the effect of the {g|Encyclopedia:CareerLeaderGlossary}Officer{/g}'s {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}abilities{/g} gain a {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} to their {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWeaponSkill}Weapon Skill{/g} equal to {uip|DamageBonus|e1d30ac6037f43d98bc14c07f1c60cfe} and will deal +{unit_stat|WarhammerFellowship|bonus} more {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} on {g|Encyclopedia:AttackOfOpportunityFullGlossary}attacks of opportunity{/g} until the start of the Officer's next {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}.
